{"id":721740077,"lang":"java","time":"1 day, 8 hours","timestamp":1655178670,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"14 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721740077/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"46.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String w1, String w2) {\n        int l = lcs(w1, w2);\n        return w1.length() + w2.length() - 2*l;\n    }\n    public static int lcs(String a ,String b){\n        int m = a.length();\n        int n = b.length();\n        int[][] dp = new int[m+1][n+1];\n        for(int i =0; i<=m ; i++){\n            for(int j =0; j<=n ; j++){\n                if (i==0 || j==0){\n                    dp[i][j] = 0;\n                }\n                else if (a.charAt(i-1) == b.charAt(j-1)){\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j] = Math.max(dp[i-1][j] , dp[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n\n}\n\n\n// leetcode\n// etco","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings"}
